strings.evolution:
This power is to be used for the weak?
I'm not mistaken, right?
strings.affinity:
Thanks to you, I feel I now
understand what I need to do.
I want to stay with you, if that's all right.
strings.description: A veteran member of the Raven, the rebel army opposing the Zoldaad Empire, and a highly emotional man. Following Jake's departure from Zoldaad, Abel sought to return to the man he had once been by helping to re-establish a just empire from the shadows. Now he aids the unfortunate who cry for help while devoting his best efforts to accelerating the recovery of his lover, who had previously been made into a mechanized soldier by the former militant empire.
strings.fusion:
I, with this power...
I want to save as many people as possible.
strings.summon:
I will do everything I am capable of doing.
Just like when I was with the Ravens.

strings.evolution:
My power is overflowing!
...No, if I get caught up in this,
it'll be the empire all over again.
strings.affinity:
Thanks to you, I feel I now
understand what I need to do.
I want to stay with you, if that's all right.
strings.description: A veteran member of the rebel army opposing the militant rule of the Zoldaad Empire. Abel is such a capable soldier that he has earned leader Jake's trust. However, being deeply in touch with his emotions has caused him to lose composure at the sight of the countless tragedies that have befallen his country, and after witnessing his lover being turned into a mechanized soldier by the empire.
strings.fusion:
Power should be used to help the weak.
That is what the Ravens believe.
strings.summon:
Are these memories toward that person,
or will I never escape this torment.
Either way, as long as they can be of use.

strings.affinity:
Thanks to you, I feel I now
understand what I need to do.
I want to stay with you, if that's all right.
strings.description: A veteran member of the Raven, the group behind the rebellion against the empire of Zoldaad. Abel has been friends with Jake, the leader of the rebel army, for quite some time. Naturally, the rest of his comrades are rather fond of his sociable attitude as well. However, when tragedy struck after a fellow member of the rebel army was captured and brainwashed, he went on a suicidal rampage.
strings.fusion: Even normal people can be strengthened by their memories.
strings.summon:
I knew I had an indomitable will,
but I never would have thought
I would become a vision.
